definition: The value is a telephone number used for voice calls. Use of full international numbers starting with + is recommended to enable automatic dialing support but not required.
The value is a fax machine. Use of full international numbers starting with + is recommended to enable automatic dialing support but not required.
The value is an email address.
The value is a pager number. These may be local pager numbers that are only usable on a particular pager system.
A contact that is not a phone
column5: pager or email address and is expressed as a URL. This is intended for various institutional or personal contacts including web sites
column10: etc. Do not use for email addresses.

definition: A contact that can be used for sending an sms message (e.g. mobile phones
A contact that is not a phone
column5: page or email address and is not expressible as a URL. E.g. Internal mail address. This SHOULD NOT be used for contacts that are expressible as a URL (e.g. Skype
